item.title: Need help with client models not working
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Make it look like this.

} if(i == 13642) // (INSERT)" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14057; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14058;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14058;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Statius's full helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A reward from PKing some narbs ;)".getBytes();//examin info

Basically all you need to do is change the code around, but it should be in this format, this is just an example of what it should look like, not the item, the format of the code. Try changing your original code aswell to help replace it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with client models not working
item.dc:creator: @iisbacknoob iisbacknoob
item.description:
@iisbacknoob wrote:

i made a cape its black with wings comming out i added a code that i made up to class8.java in my client files and i added my model to my models file in my client this is what it did when i used the pickup command looks nothing like a black cape and wings =.= please help what else am i missing something??

2edo1e8.jpg767×523

code that i used…

if(i == 7104)//item id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "wear"; class8.anInt174 = 7104; class8.anInt181 = 919; class8.anInt190 = 429; class8.anInt198 = 1660; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 5; class8.anInt197 = 120; class8.anInt165 = 7104; class8.anInt200 = 7104; class8.anInt175 = 65; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "dark wing cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "a special cape".getBytes(); }
my “cape” looks like glass -.- what did i do wrong?

Read full topic
